title: Biodegradability of Unheated and Laboratory Heated Dissolved Organic Matter
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EM00383C, Paper
Saraf Islam Promi, Courtney Gardner, Amanda K Hohner
Following wildfires, partially combusted biomass remains on the forest floor and erosion from the landscape can release dissolved pyrogenic organic matter (dPyOM) to surface waters. Therefore, post-fire alterations to dissolved...
